rules_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, search your library for a basic Plains card and reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
https://redslug.tumblr.com/post/717034757212585984/heading-home-from-the-fields-a-typical-butterfly#notes



OG_1:
When MV2 Flyword enters the battlefield, create an implant with a flying counter.


Alt:
When MV2 enters the battlefield, create an implant with a shield counter.
